flex2.tools.oem.internal

Class LinkerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • flex2.compiler.common.Configuration
      • flex2.tools.ToolsConfiguration
        • flex2.tools.oem.internal.LinkerConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LinkerConfiguration, Cloneable

    public class LinkerConfiguration
extends ToolsConfiguration
implements LinkerConfiguration
    A configuration that extends ToolsConfiguration by adding link specific options.
    Version:
    2.0.1
    Author:
    Clement Wong
